songs.title: Pink Notes
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I don't just want that drink, honey
Pink-pink-pink-pink-pink, pink money
I just, I just, I just want that pink money
I just, I just, I just want that pink money
I just want that pink money, I-I-I just want that pink money

[Hook]
To all the girls on the dancefloor looking cheeky
I know why you want to meet me
(I don't just want that drink, honey
Don't, don't just want that drink, honey)
To all the girls uptown who love the pink stuff
You're all broke but you're bound to drink 'nuff
(I'm not being funny, honey
I just want that pink money)
Ladies, I know your game
Before you come over, think again
(I don't just want that drink, honey
Pink-pink-pink-pink-pink, pink money)
East, west, north, south
We know what you're all about
(No, I want your pink money
No-no, I want your pink money)

I don't just want that drink money
Pink-pink-pink-pink-pink, pink money

[Verse 1]
Classy or nasty places
I meet them on a weekly basis
They walk up with their cheeky faces
I've got pink so they want to taste this
Let's face it, ladies
Maybe pink is on your brain
Lipstick, nails, pink champagne
It's always the same

[Hook]

[Verse 2]
She's emptied out my wallet that was full today
But I know we're gonna rock it, so that's OK
She's gorgeous and she's clever, the girl gets paid
Tonight we'll last forever, forever

[Hook]
